overview:
President Riley Resources Investment Management industry June 2007 – Present Manages a single family office with investments in a printing company, public and private equities, alternatives, and real estate.

Board Member DRG Technologies 1990 – Present

Vice President and Treasurer Third Avenue Loft’s UOA December 2007 – November 2010 (3 years) Responsible for reducing operating expenses over 28%, and reducing dues over 35% while maintaining or improving services in a challenging economy.

degrees.institution: The University of Texas at Austin
